name: DataObscured
description:
A slice of a game where you are playing as a Data Security Guard. Your job is to prevent viruses overrun the digital infrastructure and increase your ability to destroy these threats.

Survival is key, live as long as you can. Sell the data for upgrading your avatar, weapon or Companion

Models used:

Free Futuristic Weapon Assets - By Niko-3D-models

Low poly futuristic city assets - By Niko-3D-models 

3D Spaceships Pack - By Loki

Source Code:

https://github.com/Knase23/DataObscuredLightweightRP
